results.title: Buffalo soldiers
results.creator_credit: Charles Haid, Gordon Wolf and Turner Pictures Worldwide
results.brief_description: A group of African-American cavalrymen ride into a desolate, racist and inhospitable frontier town. The town dishonours them, their Native American foes honour them, as Apache leader Victorio gives the soldiers a name of honour and strength, Buffalo Soldiers. The trooper’s daring hunt for Victorio (Harrison Lowe) frames this stirring tribute to the former slaves and other African- Americans of the 9th and 10th U.S Cavalry Regiments. Cast includes Danny Glover, Bob Gunton, Carl Lumbly and Glynn Turman.

results.title: Buffalo Bill and the Indians [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Robert Altman and De Laurentiis Entertainment Group
results.brief_description: Robert Altman’s “Buffalo Bill and the Indians” sardonically explores the gap between western history and legend in show biz-obsessed America. Megalomaniac “Buffalo Bill” Cody assumes the legend created for him by writer Ned Buntline, aided and abetted by his producer and his publicist, perpetuating myths of white triumph over savage “Injuns” in his Wild West show, as audiences cheer him on and buy his merchandise. But when Sitting Bull joins the troupe with his interpreter, his request for authenticity threatens to throw a wrench into the proceedings. Regardless of how Bill may feel about the facts, he must bow to the preferences of the paying public. Cast includes: Paul Newman, Joel Grey, Kevin McCarthy, Harvey Keitel, Allan Nicholls, Geraldine Chaplin, Burt Lancaster, Frank Kaquitts.

results.title: Buffalo 66
results.creator_credit: Vincent Gallo, Chris Hanley and Cinepix Film Properties
results.brief_description: Vincent Gallo made his directorial debut with this comedy drama about convict, Billy Brown, who is released from prison after serving a five year sentence for a crime he did not commit. Bitter and prone to violence, Billy is determined to convince his dysfunctional parents that he has been leading a respectable life doing top-secret CIA work. To give his story credibility, he impulsively kidnaps Layla from a tap-dancing class, forcing her to pose as his wife when he returns home for a visit. Layla strangely takes to the role with enthusiasm and remains with Billy even after the parental visit. Cast includes: Vincent Gallo, Christina Ricci, Anjelica Huston, Ben Gazzara, Kevin Corrigan, Mickey Rourke, Rosanna Arquette and Jan-Michael Vincent.

results.title: Buena vista social club
results.creator_credit: Wim Wenders, Ulrich Felsburg, Deepak Nayar, Road Movies, Kintop Pictures, ICAIC and Arte
results.brief_description: Ry Cooder went to Cuba in 1996 to meet with a group of legendary musicians of the 1930’s, 40’s and 50’s. The result was the Grammy Award winning album Buena Vista Social Club. When Cooder travelled to Cuba again in 1998 to record a solo album with Ibrahim Ferrer - again with all the musicians of the Buena Vista Social Club - Wim Wenders accompanied him with a small film crew, observing the musicians in the studio and tracing their lives in Havana.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Wim Wenders, Ulrich Felsburg, Deepak Nayar, Road Movies, Kintop Pictures, ICAIC and Arte

results.title: Budjerri Dyillagami: Peggeralin
results.brief_description: A video artwork by Ngarigo artist Peter Waples-Crowe in collaboration with Glynn Urquhart.

constellations_other.name: Broadcasting marginal voices
constellations_other.description: The creation of Indigenous broadcasting in Central Australia from the late 1970s meant an array of diverse Black stories could be shared. Today, important stories told by those who physically and metaphorically live on the margins can be broadcast widely.

results.description: A video artwork by Ngarigo artist Peter Waples-Crowe in collaboration with Glynn Urquhart.

results.title: Budgie the little helicopter. - Volume 3.
results.brief_description: Budgie the little helicopter and his friends take part in five adventures. “Copters and robbers”: Budgie is determined to catch two crooks who want to steal a plane. “Daydreams and candyfloss” sees Budgie at the fairground rescuing a couple stuck on the Big Wheel. Budgie gets to visit the Arctic in “Flying in Arctic circles.” “Whats Bruin?”: Budgie finds a baby whale beached on the ice while visiting the Artctic. “Down on the farm”: the planes are called to help get the crops in and Budgie is called upon to save the day.

results.title: Budgie the little helicopter. - Volume 2.
results.creator_credit: Gary Blatchford, Michael Algar, Sarah Ferguson, Duchess of York, HTV, Fred Wolf Films and Sleepy Kid Company
results.brief_description: Budgie the little helicopter and his friends embark on four fun-filled adventures. In “The Airshow”, Budgie leads the fly past at the Harefield Airshow. Crooks try to steal a French plane called Genevieve and Budgie saves the day. A catch of lobsters almost gets the best of Budgie in “Budgie takes a catch”. Budgie gets to spend a night on an aircraft destroyer in “All at sea”. The final story “Boats, boots and Budgie” sees the intrepid helicopter rescue a cow during bad floods.

results.title: Budgie the little helicopter. - Volume 1.
results.brief_description: Budgie is the bravest, cheekiest, friendliest, “nippiest” little helicopter at Harefield Airport. When he isn’t getting into trouble, he’s busy flying off on an adventure and his friend Pippa, and his other airborne friends are happy to lend a wing to him out of a a scrape. Based on the successful picture-storybook created by Her Royal Highness, The Duchess of York, Budgie’s adventures will delight young children. The four episodes are: “Pippa arrives”, “‘Chuck comes unstuck”, “Budgie’s blizzard” and “Ice work Budgie”.

results.title: Budgeting your money
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Consumer skills”.
This film shows four young people in different financial situations discussing their budgeting problems in conversations which lead to information on how budgets are made and carried out. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Budgeting (NP)
results.brief_description: Shows the essentials of business budgeting, explains how to construct a budget and why it is such an important management tool. Provides clear and colourful graphics with animated sequences. Features John Cleese. FOR USE ONLY IN A DOMESTIC SITUATION OR FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY.
